offer_summary.job_description: We are on the road to growing our hub in Warsaw, so we are looking for FullStack Engineers with JS, TS and Node.js who believe that you work better with people you can see face to face. Joining the team is a unique opportunity to work with modern financial systems with large scale, high availability and resilience.
requirements: Framework Knowledge: React.js (front-end) or Node.js (back-end), Redux (state management), Context API, Hook.
CI/CD Experience. Experience with npm or yarn. Familiarity with Webpack and Babel.
Experience with NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Firebase), SQL.
Handling databases in backend systems using Node.js.
Familiarity with serverless architecture (e.g., AWS). Experience with AWS services and cloud infrastructure in projects.
System Design Focus, especially for senior engineers, assess their ability to design scalable, maintainable systems through architecture discussions.
Previous experience in startups, scale-ups, fintech, payment-related, streaming modern tech companies.
benefits: sharing the costs of sports activities
sharing the costs of foreign language classes
